div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 516 Jigodin, 70 km. NNE of Sf. Gheorghe, Rumania, 1938 Burial: c. 150-125 B.C. (T) Contents: 19+ AR. Pot hoard Macedonia, 1st Region: 1 tetradr. Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 15 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Sf. Gheorghe 17 as listed Székely, Székely nemzeti Múzeum Kiadányai 5 (Sfantu-Gheorghe, 1946), pp. 33-8 and p. 51 (French summary), illus.
